src:
Reportan camioneta Mazda con impactos de bala en la Costerita
Aproximadamente a las 09:00 horas se reportó a los números de emergencia una camioneta mazda tinta con placas VJW-238-A con impactos de bala en el parabrisa y chocada de la parte delantera
06 Nov 2019, 22:40 by El Debate
Culiacán, Sinaloa.- Aproximadamente a las 09:00 horas se reportó a los números de emergencia que por el libramiento Benito Juárez la costerita con dirección de Oriente a Poniente se encontraba una camioneta mazda tinta con placas VJW-238-A con impactos de bala en el parabrisa y chocada de la parte delantera.
Agentes de la Policía municipal se trasladaron al lugar confirmando dicho reporte.




La camioneta Mazda modelo 2019 coincide con las características del vehículo que se utilizó en la ejecución de la escolta del subsecretario de Seguridad Pública. Además, posee características similares a las camionetas que se usaron por grupos armados el pasado jueves 17, incluso en una de las imágenes que circuló por Internet se ve cómo con ella bloquean la avenida Álvaro Obregón.


Foto: Cortesía

Al acercarse a la unidad observaron un cuerpo sin vida en el asiento del copiloto por lo que se dijo por parte de las autoridades que posiblemente venía una segunda persona abordo de la unidad de la cual se desconoce su paradero.
Estos mismos agentes acordonaron el área para resguardar toda posible evidencia relacionada con el cuerpo.
Posteriormente se solicitó la presencia de personal de las Fiscalía e investigadores siendo estos quienes se encargarán de las diligencias correspondientes.
Al lugar también arribaron decenas de militares .
Al lugar llegó una persona pidiendo pueblo dejará ver a la víctima ya que la camioneta cumplía con las características de su familiar pero al acercarse pudo constatar que no era su familiar.






Policiaca Sinaloa
text:
Mazda truck reported with bullet impacts in La Costerita
At approximately 9:00 a.m., a mazda ink truck with VJW-238-A plates with bullet impacts on the windshield and collision at the front was reported to the emergency numbers
06 Nov 2019, 22:40 by El Debate
Culiacán, Sinaloa.- Approximately at 09:00 hours it was reported to the emergency numbers that by the Benito Juarez release, the coast with direction from East to West was a Mazda ink truck with VJW-238-A plates with bullet impacts on the windshield and collided from the front.
Municipal Police agents moved to the place confirming said report.




The Mazda 2019 model truck matches the characteristics of the vehicle that was used in the execution of the escort of the Undersecretary of Public Security. In addition, it has similar characteristics to the vans that were used by armed groups on Thursday 17, even in one of the images that circulated on the Internet you can see how they block Álvaro Obregón avenue.


Photo: Courtesy

As they approached the unit, they observed a lifeless body in the passenger seat, so it was said by the authorities that a second person could possibly come aboard the unit whose whereabouts are unknown.
These same agents cordoned off the area to protect all possible evidence related to the body.
Subsequently, the presence of staff from the Prosecutor's Office and investigators was requested, and these were responsible for the corresponding procedures.
Dozens of soldiers also arrived at the place.
A person arrived at the place asking people to let the victim see since the van met the characteristics of his family member but when he approached he could verify that he was not his relative.






Police Sinaloa
